trans-unit.source: Implements low-level personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer lavt nivå tilpassing operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: This class implements the logic required to carry out lower-level personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen implementerer logikken kreves for å utføre operasjoner på lavere nivåer personlige data.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class manages the high-level life cycle of personalization, it is the WebPartPersonalization class that is responsible for actually implementing the physical steps necessary to carry out specific personalization actions.
trans-unit.target: Selv om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>klassen behandler på høyt nivå livssyklusen for tilpasning, er det WebPartPersonalization klassen som er ansvarlig for å iverksette fysisk fremgangsmåten som er nødvendig å utføre bestemte tilpassing handlinger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartPersonalization class in turn relies on an implementation of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> to communicate with the underlying data store for personalization information.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebPartPersonalization i sin tur implementering av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>til å kommunisere med underliggende datalageret for informasjon om tilpassing.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: If you use the default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, it creates an instance of the WebPartPersonalization class that you can use by referencing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker standard implementering av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, opprettes en forekomst av klassen WebPartPersonalization som du kan bruke ved å referere til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property, you would specify `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel å få tilgang til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>egenskapen du vil angi `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes an instance of this class and associates it with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control on whose behalf the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance will carry out personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer en forekomst av denne klassen, og knytter det til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontroll på vegne av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>forekomsten vil utføre tilpassing operasjoner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> used to manage the personalization information
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> brukes til å administrere informasjonen om tilpassing

trans-unit.source: owner is .
trans-unit.target: owneris .

trans-unit.source: Applies personalization data to the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder personlige data til overordnet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>er satt til `true`, denne metoden kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A>-metoden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>forekomsten du vil bruke statusen for personlige data på den angitte webdeler-kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applies personalization data to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control when requested to do so by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder personlige data til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollerer ved forespørsel etter overordnet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method is called to apply personalization data to an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>-derived class when requested to do so by the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden hvis du vil bruke personlige data for en individuell <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>-avledede klassen ved forespørsel etter overordnet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>er satt til `true`, denne metoden kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A>-metoden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>forekomsten du vil bruke statusen for personlige data på den angitte webdeler-kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to which personalization data is to be applied.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler kontrollere hvilke personlige data er som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to apply personalization state to a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å bruke statusen for personlige data på en webdeler kontroll som ikke administreres av overordnet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the user is authorized to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om brukeren er autorisert til å angi <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> omfanget.

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` if the user is authorized in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> to enter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer `true` Hvis brukeren er godkjent i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>inn <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>omfang.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: The first time the property is called, it determines the user's right to enter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope and caches the information.
trans-unit.target: Første gang egenskapen kalles, fastsette brukeren er riktig inn <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>område og bufrer informasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A> dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not shown on subsequent calls to this property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>ordlisten er endret etter første gang denne egenskapen kalles, endringer blir ikke vist i etterfølgende kall til denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is authorized to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren har tillatelse til å angi <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> område; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Changes the current page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> instance to the scope specified.
trans-unit.target: Endrer den gjeldende siden <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> forekomsten til det angitte området.

trans-unit.source: This method changes the currently executing page's personalization scope to the new scope specified by the `newScope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden endringer i øyeblikket kjøres siden område til det nye området som er angitt av den `newScope` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: This method is the protected helper method that is called by the public <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er den beskyttede helper som kalles av offentlig <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: This protected method exists to handle future extensibility if there are more than two possible scopes to switch between.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes denne beskyttede metoden til å behandle fremtidige extensibility Hvis det finnes mer enn to mulige omfang for å bytte mellom.

trans-unit.source: If the current scope and `newScope` are the same value, then this method performs no operation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis gjeldende omfang og `newScope` er den samme verdien og denne metoden utfører Ingen operasjon.

trans-unit.source: The new personalization scope for the current page.
trans-unit.target: Det nye området for gjeldende side.

trans-unit.source: If attempting to switch from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope, the current user does not have the user capability to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å bytte fra <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> område til <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> omfanget gjeldende bruker har ikke brukeren mulighet til å angi <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> omfanget.

trans-unit.source: scope is not a valid member of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: scopeer ikke et gyldig medlem av den opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Extracts the personalization state from one Web Parts control and applies it to a second Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Trekker ut statusen for personlige data fra en kontroll av webdeler og gjelder for en annen webdeler-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: This method extracts the personalization state from `webPartA` and applies it to `webPartB`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden trekker ut statusen for personlige data fra `webPartA` og bruker den til `webPartB`.

trans-unit.source: This method assumes that `webPartA` and `webPartB` are the same type.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden antar at `webPartA` og `webPartB` er av samme type.

trans-unit.source: If the Web Parts controls are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls, the method copies the personalization state from the child control wrapped in `webPartA` to the child control wrapped in `webPartB`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis webdeler kontrollene <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>kontroller, metoden overfører statusen for personlige data fra den underordnede kontrollen omsluttet `webPartA` til den underordnede kontrollen omsluttet av `webPartB`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: As part of the copy operation, `webPartB` is marked as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Som en del av kopieringen, `webPartB` er markert som "skadet".

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control supplying the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler kontrollen oppgir personlige data.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control receiving the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler kontrollen mottak av personlige data.

trans-unit.source: Either webPartA or webPartB is .
trans-unit.target: Either webPartA or webPartB is .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om bruk av personlige data forespørres aktiveres for den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir om forespørres personlige data som skal aktiveres for overordnet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Note that this is a subtle but important distinction from the intent of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en svak, men viktig forskjell fra intent og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan bare angis før fullføring av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In practice, this means that the Enabled property must be set in the page markup on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element if personalization should be disabled.
trans-unit.target: I praksis, betyr dette at egenskapen Enabled må angis i siden markup på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>elementet hvis personlige data skal deaktiveres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan eventuelt angis under den `PreInit` fase av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if personalization is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilpassing er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property value after the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*> method had completed.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi verdier for denne egenskapen etter den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>metoden var fullført.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance has completed initialization or that the current user has rights to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Sikrer at den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> forekomsten er fullført initialisering eller gjeldende bruker har rettigheter til å endre statusen for personlige data.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating which type of check should be made.
trans-unit.target: En boolsk verdi som angir hvilken type kontroller skal utføres.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref> instance of a user's authorization to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: Representerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref> forekomst av en brukers godkjenning til å angi <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> omfanget.

trans-unit.source: The user right is represented by the string "enterSharedScope" in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren høyre representeres av strengen "enterSharedScope" i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>forekomsten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Extracts personalization data from the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Trekker ut personlige data fra overordnet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control during its <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>er satt til `true`, og nullstilles ikke statusen for personlige data under nettsiden (for eksempel når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>egenskapen `false`), og denne metoden trekker ut personlige data fra overordnet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollere under den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartManagerPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to extract personalization state from the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartManagerPersonalization%2A>-metoden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>forekomsten skal hente statusen for personlige data fra overordnet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartManagerPersonalization%2A>

trans-unit.source: Extracts personalization data from a Web Parts control when requested to do so by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Trekker ut personlige data fra en webdeler-kontroll ved forespørsel etter overordnet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the Web Parts control specified by `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>er satt til `true`, og nullstilles ikke statusen for personlige data under nettsiden (for eksempel når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>egenskapen `false`), og denne metoden trekker ut personlige data fra webdeler kontrollen som er angitt av `webPart`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to extract personalization state from the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartPersonalization%2A>-metoden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>forekomsten skal hente statusen for personlige data fra den angitte webdeler-kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartPersonalization%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control containing personalization data to be extracted.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler kontrollere som inneholder personlige data som skal trekkes ut.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to extract personalization state from a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å hente statusen for personlige data fra en webdeler kontroll som ikke administreres av overordnet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Henter authorization-filteret hvis eventuelle knyttet til den angitte webdeler-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the Web Parts control identified by `webPartID`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden henter authorization-filteret hvis eventuelle tilknyttet webdeler kontrollen som er identifisert av `webPartID`.

trans-unit.source: Each Web Parts control that is serialized and managed by personalization is associated with a `webPartID` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hver webdeler kontrolltypen er serialisert og administreres av personlige data er knyttet til en `webPartID` parameter.

trans-unit.source: At run time, a page's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control can filter the controls displayed on a page by determining whether each Web Parts control is authorized.
trans-unit.target: På kjøretid, en sides <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen kan filtrere kontroller vises på en side ved å fastsette om hver webdeler kontroll er godkjent.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This authorization information is stored as a string in the data associated with each Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Denne godkjenningsinformasjonen lagres som en streng i dataene som er knyttet til hver webdeler-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the Web Parts control associated with the filter to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: ID-webdeler for kontrollens tilknyttet filteret som skal hentes.

trans-unit.source: The authorization filter for the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Authorization filteret for den angitte webdeler-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: webPartID is or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: webPartIDer eller en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current page and personalization scope have associated personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den gjeldende side og område har tilknyttede personlige data.

trans-unit.source: This is a convenient method for determining whether the current page and scope combination has personalization data associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en praktisk metode for å bestemme om den gjeldende kombinasjonen av siden og området har personlige data som er knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: Internally, the method calls <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A> on the provider to determine whether data exists.
trans-unit.target: Internt metodekall <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>på leverandøren å avgjøre om det finnes data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the page has personalization data associated with it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis siden har personlige data som er knyttet til den. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standardområde.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the default personalization scope that should be used for the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in the absence of previous knowledge about the proper scope.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen representerer standardområde som skal brukes for overordnet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen i det forrige kunnskap om riktig området ikke finnes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: If this property is not explicitly set, it defaults to returning <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen ikke er eksplisitt er angitt, brukes som standard returnerer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>omfang.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan bare angis før fullføring av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In practice, this means InitialScope must be set in the page markup on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element.
trans-unit.target: I praksis, betyr dette InitialScope må angis i siden markup på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>element.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan eventuelt angis under den `PreInit` fase av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> indicating the default personalization scope of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> som angir standardområde for den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*> method had completed.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi denne egenskapen til en annen verdi enn den gjeldende verdien etter den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>metoden var fullført.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set a value of InitialScope that is not a member of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi en verdi for InitialScope som ikke er medlem av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilpassing er aktivert, og er lastet inn personlige data for denne forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Prior to loading personalization data, this property will always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Før du laster inn personlige data, må denne egenskapen vil alltid returnere `false`.

trans-unit.source: For example, this property will return `false` during the `PreInit` phase.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel denne egenskapen vil returnere `false` under den `PreInit` fase.

trans-unit.source: After the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>'s <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method has successfully completed (during which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method is called), this property will then return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Etter den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>'s <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>metoden har fullført (der den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>metoden), denne egenskapen, returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This property is a publicly accessible alias for the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en offentlig tilgjengelige alias for det beskyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if personalization is enabled for the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance and personalization data has successfully loaded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilpassing er aktivert for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> forekomsten og personlige data har ble lastet inn; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilpassing er aktivert, og er lastet inn personlige data for denne forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: If the personalization feature is enabled (if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A> property is set to `true`), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance is considered initialized immediately after the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>'s <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method has successfully completed (during which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method is called).
trans-unit.target: Hvis funksjonen tilpassing er aktivert (Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A>er satt til `true`), <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>forekomsten anses initialisert rett etter den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>'s <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>metoden har fullført (der den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>metoden).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Prior to loading personalization data, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Før du laster inn personlige data, må denne egenskapen alltid returnerer `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if personalization is initialized for this instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilpassing initialiseres for denne forekomsten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current user is authorized to modify state information.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den gjeldende brukeren er autorisert til å endre statusinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: The first time this property is called, it caches the result of determining the user’s right to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Første gang egenskapen kalles, bufrer resultatet av å fastslå brukerens rettigheter til å endre statusen for personlige data.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A> dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not reflected in subsequent calls to this property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>ordlisten er endret etter første gang egenskapen kalles, vises ikke endringene i etterfølgende kall til denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is authorized to modify state information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren har tillatelse til å endre statusinformasjon; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes personalization.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer personlige data.

trans-unit.source: This is the main entry point for initializing personalization information on behalf of the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Dette er det primære inngangspunktet for å initialisere informasjon om tilpassing på vegne av overordnet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This method is called during the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles under overordnet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Normally, if personalization has been disabled on the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, this method will never be called.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis hvis personlige data er deaktivert i overordnet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontroll, denne metoden kan ikke kalles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: During the course of this method, the following initializations occur: - A reference to either the default personalization provider, or the custom provider indicated in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> page markup or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A> property, is obtained.
trans-unit.target: Følgende initialiseringer forekommer i løpet av denne metoden: – en referanse til enten personlige data standardleverandøren, eller den egendefinerte leverandøren som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>siden markup eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A>egenskapen hentes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: - The provider is called to determine the user capabilities (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineUserCapabilities%2A>) for the currently executing user.
trans-unit.target: -Leverandøren kalles for å finne ut av bruker-funksjonene (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineUserCapabilities%2A>) for øyeblikket kjøres brukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineUserCapabilities%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The personalization state for the current page/user/scope combination is loaded from the underlying data store by the provider (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.LoadPersonalizationState%2A>) and stored within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance.
trans-unit.target: -Statusen for personlige data for den gjeldende bruker/page-området-kombinasjonen er lastet inn fra det underliggende datalageret av leverandøren (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.LoadPersonalizationState%2A>) og lagret i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>forekomsten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.LoadPersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The personalization scope for the current page/user/scope is determined by the provider (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineInitialScope%2A>).
trans-unit.target: -Område for gjeldende bruker/page-området er avhengig av leverandøren (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineInitialScope%2A>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineInitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the result of this determination might be different than the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at resultatet av dette forsøket kan være forskjellig fra verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: The scope value returned from this method is used as the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Områdeverdien som ble returnert fra denne metoden brukes som verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception due to personalization not being enabled will occur only if the Load method is called directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>unntak på grunn av personlige data som ikke er aktivert skjer bare hvis metoden Load kalles direkte.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the load, and this helper method silently returns if personalization has not been enabled for the page.
trans-unit.target: En intern helper faktisk-metoden til å utføre belastningen i ASP.NET-implementering, og hjelper metoden returnerer stille Hvis personlige data ikke er aktivert for siden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> instance for the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> forekomsten for overordnet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The underlying personalization providers failed to initialize because a default provider could not be found or because a failure occurred while attempting to initialize a personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: Underliggende tilpassing leverandørene kan ikke starte fordi en standardleverandøren ikke finner, eller fordi det oppstod en feil under forsøk på å initialisere en leverandør av personlige data.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref> instance of a user's authorization to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Representerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref> forekomst av en brukers godkjenning til å endre statusen for personlige data.

trans-unit.source: The user right is represented by the string "modifyState" in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren høyre representeres av strengen "modifyState" i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>forekomsten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the provider name for personalization.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Leverandørnavn for bruk av personlige data.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value set for this property in the page declaration.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer verdien som er angitt for denne egenskapen i side-deklarering.

trans-unit.source: If this property was not set, it returns <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen ikke er angitt, returneres <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the page uses the default personalization provider specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet bruker siden tilpassing standardleverandør angitt i konfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan bare angis før fullføring av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This means the ProviderName property must be set in the page declaration on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr ProviderName-egenskapen må være angitt i deklarasjonen siden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>element.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan eventuelt angis under den `PreInit` fase.

trans-unit.source: The name of the personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på leverandøren av personlige data.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*> method has completed.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi denne egenskapen til en annen verdi enn den gjeldende verdien etter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>metoden er fullført.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: Resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller personlige data for gjeldende side, omfang og bruker i den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: This method resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilbakestiller personlige data for gjeldende side, omfang og bruker i den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: As a side effect of the reset, the currently executing page is re-executed by a <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: Som en side effekt av tilbakestillingen utføres siden for øyeblikket kjøres på nytt med en <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>kall.</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that this transfer re-executes the current page as a `GET` request regardless of how the page was originally requested.
trans-unit.target: Merk at denne overføringen på nytt utfører gjeldende side som en `GET` forespørselen uansett hvor siden opprinnelig ble forespurt.

trans-unit.source: This method can be called at any time.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan kalles når som helst.

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls the ResetPersonalizationState method on the provider.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller internt ResetPersonalizationState-metoden på tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: After data is successfully reset, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Etter at dataene er tilbakestilt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is used elsewhere by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance to bypass extracting personalization data from control properties and saving it if data has already been reset.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes et annet sted av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>serverforekomsten for å omgå utpakking personlige data fra kontrollegenskaper og lagre den hvis data har allerede blitt tilbakestilt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> forekomsten kan ikke referere til en gyldig tilpassing-leverandør.

trans-unit.source: Saves personalization data for the current page, scope, and user to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer personlige data for gjeldende side, omfang og bruker den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles under den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Internally, the method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.SavePersonalizationState%2A> method on the provider.
trans-unit.target: Internt metodekall i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.SavePersonalizationState%2A>-metoden på tjenesten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.SavePersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to save personalization data when the currently executing user does not have the capability called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability> (within the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance) results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å lagre personlige data når i øyeblikket kjøres brukeren ikke har funksjonen kalles <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability>(i gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>forekomsten) fører til en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>unntak.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: Note that this would only be true if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control called the protected Save method directly.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at dette bare er true hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>control kalles det beskyttede lagre metoden direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the save, and this helper method silently returns if the currently executing user does not have rights to modify data.
trans-unit.target: En intern helper faktisk-metoden til å utføre i ASP.NET-implementering, og hjelper metoden returnerer stille Hvis i øyeblikket kjøres brukeren ikke har rettigheter til å endre data.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current personalization scope for the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende område for overordnet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This value is initially set based on the value returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien er satt basert på verdien som returneres fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value can be modified by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan endres ved å kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that this represents the scope used for applying and extracting personalization information.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at dette representerer omfanget som brukes for å bruke og å trekke ut personlige data.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property might differ from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen kan være forskjellig fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> instance indicating the scope of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> forekomsten som angir omfanget for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Marks the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Merker overordnet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen som har personlige data som er endret (er "endret").

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method marks the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>er satt til `true`, denne metoden merker overordnet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollere som "skadet".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation details of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, this method might invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av implementeringsdetaljene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollens forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, denne metoden kan aktivere sikkerhetskontroller og code tilgangskontroll sikkerhet tillatelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Internt denne metodekall den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control tracks "dirty" state internally and exposes the "dirtiness" of the manager through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> property rather than through this method.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen sporer "endret" tilstand internt og viser "dirtiness" for overordnede via den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A>egenskapen i stedet for gjennom denne metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: No personalization data has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Ingen personlige data er lastet.

trans-unit.source: Marks the specified Web Parts control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Merker den angitte webdeler kontrollen har personlige data som er endret (er "endret").

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method marks the specified Web Parts control as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>er satt til `true`, denne metoden merker den angitte webdeler kontrollen som "skadet".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation details of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, this method may invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av implementeringsdetaljene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollens forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, denne metoden kan aktivere sikkerhetskontroller og code tilgangskontroll sikkerhet tillatelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be marked "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Webdeler kontrollen merkes "endret".

trans-unit.source: Attempted to mark as "dirty" a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å merke som "dirty" en webdeler kontroll som ikke administreres av overordnet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: No personalization data has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Ingen personlige data er lastet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the personalization data of the current page has been reset (for example, a request was made to delete the personalization data from the underlying data store).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om det er tilbakestilt personlige data på gjeldende side (for eksempel fikk en forespørsel til å slette personlige data fra underliggende datalager).

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, it indicates that the personalization state for the current page has been reset and that extraction of personalization data from controls and subsequent save operations should be skipped.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `true`, indikerer at statusen for personlige data for gjeldende side er tilbakestilt og henting av personlige data fra kontroller og etterfølgende lagre operasjoner skal hoppes over.

trans-unit.source: Currently, this property is automatically set to `true` by the personalization infrastructure if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: For øyeblikket denne egenskapen settes automatisk til `true` ved bruk av personlige data-infrastruktur hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that although there are no restrictions on when this property can be set, the property must be set to `true` prior to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at selv om det finnes ingen begrensninger for når denne egenskapen kan angis, egenskapen må settes til `true` før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>hendelsen skal fungere.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the personalization state for the current page has been reset; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis statusen for personlige data for gjeldende side er tilbakestilt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Switches the current page's personalization scope from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> or from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bytter gjeldende side område fra <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> til <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> til <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method toggles the currently executing page's personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden veksler i øyeblikket kjøres siden område.

trans-unit.source: Toggling the scope results in a <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> back to the current executing page.
trans-unit.target: Aktivering omfanget resulterer i en <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>tilbake til siden for gjeldende kjøres.</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method performs no operation if it is called while an export or import of a Web Parts control is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden utfører Ingen operasjon hvis kalles under en eksport eller import av en webdeler kontroll pågår.

trans-unit.source: If a toggle scope request occurs for a page that was submitted via a `POST` request, then any query string values will be preserved during the transfer; query string parameters are not preserved if the page was submitted via a `GET` request.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår en forespørsel om vekslingen-området for en side som ble sendt via en `POST` forespørselen, og alle spørringen strengverdier beholdes under overføringen; streng spørringsparametere beholdes ikke når siden ble sendt en `GET` forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to toggle to a scope that is not defined in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å bytte til et omfang som ikke er definert i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Technically, this situation should never occur.
trans-unit.target: Denne situasjonen kan oppstå egentlig aldri.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of user capabilities from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref> granted to the current user.
trans-unit.target: Henter settet med bruker-funksjoner fra <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref> gitt til gjeldende bruker.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing the set of user capabilities granted to the current user, or an empty <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary"></xref> if the user is anonymous.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>som inneholder settet med bruker-funksjoner som er gitt til gjeldende bruker eller en tom <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary"> </xref> Hvis brukeren anonym.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the current parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter en forekomst av den gjeldende overordnet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with this instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å fastslå <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen som er forbundet med denne forekomsten av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The current parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende overordnet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.
